definitions: (of an event, circumstance, etc.) causing a particular action, process, or situation to happen

examples.text: people who blush too much frequently blush arbitrarily, with no obvious triggering event

shortDefinitions: causing particular action, process, or situation to happen

definitions: (especially of something read, seen, or heard) causing someone emotional distress, typically as a result of arousing feelings or memories associated with a particular traumatic experience

examples.text: this could be very triggering for victims of sexual assault
as a sufferer of anorexia who is trying hard to recover, I found these images incredibly triggering
